name: Cave-Man
description:
Cave-Man is a (Work in Progress) procedurally generated exploration/survival game I am developing using the Unity game engine.

Cave-Man (Rockio Cavelero) is a brave explorer of the underground "Cave-Realms". 

Rockio finds himself locked in an apparently endless cave labyrinth system. In order to escape, Rockio must find artifacts using portals leading to other realms.

Controls

  • W, A, S, D: Movement
  • H: Jump
  • J: Attack
  • K: Shoot Weapon
  • L: Change to Camera Movement
  • Y: Run
  • U: Interact
  • P: Pause

  • Try and Implement a direct control system to player (instead of "tank" controls)
